00016 #include "PhyLayerBattery.h"
00017 
00018 #include "Decider80211MultiChannel.h"
00019 #include "MacToPhyControlInfo.h"
00020 #include "MacPkt_m.h"
00021 
00022 Define_Module(PhyLayerBattery);
00023 
00024 void PhyLayerBattery::initialize(int stage) {
00025   PhyLayer::initialize(stage);
00026   if (stage == 0) {
00027     numActivities = hasPar("numActivities") ? par("numActivities").longValue() : 5;
00028 
00029     /* parameters belong to the NIC, not just phy layer
00030      *
00031      * if/when variable transmit power is supported, txCurrent
00032      * should be specified as an xml table of available transmit
00033      * power levels and corresponding txCurrent */
00034     sleepCurrent = rxCurrent = decodingCurrentDelta = txCurrent = 0;
00035     setupRxCurrent = setupTxCurrent = rxTxCurrent = txRxCurrent = 0;
00036     sleepCurrent = getNic()->par( "sleepCurrent" );
00037     rxCurrent = getNic()->par( "rxCurrent" );
00038     decodingCurrentDelta = getNic()->par( "decodingCurrentDelta" );
00039     txCurrent = getNic()->par( "txCurrent" );
00040     setupRxCurrent = getNic()->par( "setupRxCurrent" );
00041     setupTxCurrent = getNic()->par( "setupTxCurrent" );
00042     rxTxCurrent = getNic()->par( "rxTxCurrent" );
00043     txRxCurrent = getNic()->par( "txRxCurrent" );
00044   } else {
00045     registerWithBattery("physical layer", numActivities);
00046     setRadioCurrent(radio->getCurrentState());
00047   }
00048 }
00049 
00050 Decider* PhyLayerBattery::getDeciderFromName(std::string name, ParameterMap& params) {
00051   if(name == "Decider80211Battery") {
00052     return initializeDecider80211Battery(params);
00053   }
00054   else if(name == "Decider80211MultiChannel") {
00055     return initializeDecider80211MultiChannel(params);
00056   }
00057 
00058   return PhyLayer::getDeciderFromName(name, params);
00059 }
00060 
00061 Decider* PhyLayerBattery::initializeDecider80211Battery(ParameterMap& params) {
00062   double threshold = params["threshold"];
00063   return new Decider80211Battery(this,
00064                    threshold,
00065                    sensitivity,
00066                    radio->getCurrentChannel(),
00067                    decodingCurrentDelta,
00068                    findHost()->getIndex(),
00069                    coreDebug);
00070 }
00071 
00072 Decider* PhyLayerBattery
00073 			::initializeDecider80211MultiChannel(ParameterMap& params)
00074 {
00075   double threshold = params["threshold"];
00076   return new Decider80211MultiChannel(this,
00077                    threshold,
00078                    sensitivity,
00079                    decodingCurrentDelta,
00080                    radio->getCurrentChannel(),
00081                    findHost()->getIndex(),
00082                    coreDebug);
00083 }
00084 
00085 void PhyLayerBattery::drawCurrent(double amount, int activity) {
00086   if(radio->getCurrentState() == Radio::RX) {
00087     if(amount != 0.0) {
00088       BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(rxCurrent + amount, DECIDER_ACCT + activity);
00089     } else {
00090       BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(rxCurrent, RX_ACCT);
00091     }
00092   } else {
00093     opp_warning("Decider wanted to change power consumption while radio not in state RX.");
00094   }
00095 }
00096 
00097 void PhyLayerBattery::handleUpperMessage(cMessage* msg) {
00098   if (battery && battery->getState() != HostState::ACTIVE) {
00099     coreEV<< "host has FAILED, dropping msg " << msg->getName() << endl;
00100     delete msg;
00101     return;
00102   }
00103 
00104   MacPkt* pkt = static_cast<MacPkt*>(msg);
00105   MacToPhyControlInfo* cInfo = static_cast<MacToPhyControlInfo*>(pkt->getControlInfo());
00106 
00107   double current = calcTXCurrentForPacket(pkt, cInfo);
00108 
00109   if(current > 0) {
00110     BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(current, TX_ACCT);
00111   }
00112 
00113   PhyLayer::handleUpperMessage(msg);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void PhyLayerBattery::handleAirFrame(AirFrame* frame) {
00117   if (battery && battery->getState() != HostState::ACTIVE) {
00118     coreEV<< "host has FAILED, dropping air frame msg " << frame->getName() << endl;
00119     delete frame;
00120     return;
00121   }
00122   PhyLayer::handleAirFrame(frame);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void PhyLayerBattery::handleHostState(const HostState& state) {
00126   if (state.get() != HostState::ACTIVE && radio->getCurrentState() != Radio::SLEEP) {
00127     coreEV<< "host is no longer in active state (maybe FAILED, SLEEP, OFF or BROKEN), force into sleep state!" << endl;
00128     setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00129     // it would be good to create a radioState OFF, as well
00130   }
00131 }
00132 
00133 void PhyLayerBattery::finishRadioSwitching() {
00134   PhyLayer::finishRadioSwitching();
00135 
00136   setRadioCurrent(radio->getCurrentState());
00137 }
00138 
00139 void PhyLayerBattery::setSwitchingCurrent(int from, int to) {
00140   double current = 0;
00141 
00142   switch(from) {
00143   case Radio::RX:
00144     switch(to) {
00145     case Radio::SLEEP:
00146       current = rxCurrent;
00147       break;
00148     case Radio::TX:
00149       current = rxTxCurrent;
00150       break;
00151     default:
00152       opp_error("Unknown radio switch! From RX to %d", to);
00153       break;
00154     }
00155     break;
00156 
00157   case Radio::TX:
00158     switch(to) {
00159     case Radio::SLEEP:
00160       current = txCurrent;
00161       break;
00162     case Radio::RX:
00163       current = txRxCurrent;
00164       break;
00165     default:
00166       opp_error("Unknown radio switch! From TX to %d", to);
00167       break;
00168     }
00169     break;
00170 
00171   case Radio::SLEEP:
00172     switch(to) {
00173     case Radio::TX:
00174       current = setupTxCurrent;
00175       break;
00176     case Radio::RX:
00177       current = setupRxCurrent;
00178       break;
00179     default:
00180       opp_error("Unknown radio switch! From SLEEP to %d", to);
00181       break;
00182     }
00183     break;
00184 
00185   default:
00186     opp_error("Unknown radio state: %d", from);
00187     break;
00188   }
00189 
00190   BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(current, SWITCHING_ACCT);
00191 }
00192 
00193 void PhyLayerBattery::setRadioCurrent(int rs) {
00194   switch(rs) {
00195   case Radio::RX:
00196     BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(rxCurrent, RX_ACCT);
00197     break;
00198   case Radio::TX:
00199     BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(txCurrent, TX_ACCT);
00200     break;
00201   case Radio::SLEEP:
00202     BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(sleepCurrent, SLEEP_ACCT);
00203     break;
00204   default:
00205     opp_error("Unknown radio state: %d", rs);
00206     break;
00207   }
00208 }
00209 
00210 simtime_t PhyLayerBattery::setRadioState(int rs) {
00211   Enter_Method_Silent();
00212   int prevState = radio->getCurrentState();
00213 
00214   if (battery) {
00215     if (battery && battery->getState() != HostState::ACTIVE && rs != Radio::SLEEP && prevState != rs) {
00216       coreEV << "can not switch radio state, host is not in active state!" << endl;
00217       return -1;
00218     }
00219   }
00220 
00221   simtime_t endSwitch = PhyLayer::setRadioState(rs);
00222 
00223   if(endSwitch >= 0) {
00224     if(radio->getCurrentState() == Radio::SWITCHING) {
00225       setSwitchingCurrent(prevState, rs);
00226     }
00227   }
00228 
00229   return endSwitch;
00230 }
